title: Kansas Frontier Demo Entities
description: Sample entities (settlements, treaties, trails, railroads) for demo and testing in the Kansas-Frontier-Matrix web viewer.

entities.title: Lawrence
entities.description: Founded in 1854 by Free-State settlers. Center of Bleeding Kansas conflict.

entities.title: Kansas–Nebraska Act
entities.description: Established Kansas and Nebraska territories, allowing settlers to determine slavery status by popular sovereignty.

entities.title: Santa Fe Trail
entities.description: 19th-century transportation route connecting Missouri to Santa Fe, New Mexico, passing through Kansas.

entities.title: MKT Railroad (Katy)
entities.description: The Missouri–Kansas–Texas Railroad, first to enter Texas from the north. Key in Kansas commerce by 1870s.
